item.title: Poongaathu Thirumbuma? Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This is a relatively old song. The lyrics are in rustic Tamil style. Melody by Ilayaraja. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1ujkKvIpyfY **Poongaathu thirumbuma? Yaen paatte virumbuma? Paaraate, madiyil vaichu thaalaate,
